description:
In order to obtain information about a group that is against the legalization of r*pe,
one r*ped a certain married woman and succeeded to draw out information from her.
To his surprise, it`s his coworker that belongs to the group!
Then he r*pes the coworker and makes her feels good to... 
Source: DLSite

titles.title: わたしたち幸せです... ご主人様っ
